model.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.entities.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoundsListener, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barge, Boss, Player, Trash

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoundsListener, java.io.Serializable
    An abstract class that represents a moving component/image of the game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Entity.EntityType
      A semantic type indicating what type of Entity this is

    • Field Detail

      • ignoreBounds

        protected boolean ignoreBounds

      • isAtBottom

        protected boolean isAtBottom
        The boolean representing whether or not the Entity is at the bottom of the worldBounds Rectangle. Objects that extend Entity may need access to this attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public abstract Entity.EntityType getType()
        indicates to other classes what type of Entity this is
        Returns:
        The EntityType which best describes this given Entity

      • setWorldBounds

        public void setWorldBounds(Bounds worldBounds)
        Sets the Bounds of the world for this Entity. An Entity can't move outside of the worldBounds.
        Parameters:
        worldBounds - A Bounds representing the of the world

      • getWorldBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getWorldBounds()
        Gets the world bounds of the object
        Returns:
        The world bounds

      • getBounds

        public Bounds getBounds()
        Returns the Bounds representing the position for the Entity
        Returns:
        The Bounds representing the position for the Entity

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(int x,
                        int y)
        Sets the location of the Bounds representing the position of the Entity to the specified x and y position.
        Parameters:
        x - The new x position of the Bounds
        y - The new y position of the Bounds

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Entity e)
        Checks if this Entity's Bounds intersects the specified Entity's Bounds.
        Parameters:
        e - The other Entity
        Returns:
        True if this Entity's Bounds intersects the other Entity's Bounds, false otherwise

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(double dx,
                     double dy)
        Sets the speed of the Entity in the x and y direction. The Entity moves according to its speed.
        Parameters:
        dx - The new speed of the Entity in the x direction
        dy - The new speed of the Entity in the y direction

      • atBottom

        public boolean atBottom()
        Checks to see if the Entity is at the bottom of the worldBounds.
        Returns:
        True if Entity is at the bottom of the worldBounds, false otherwise

      • atTop

        public boolean atTop()
        Check if trash is at or above the top of the water
        Returns:
        Boolean: true if trash is at or above the top of the world

      • update

        public void update(double gravity,
                   double drag)
        Updates the position of the Entity's BOunds based on gravity, drag, and the Entity's speed. The Entity will not be updated if it is stopped.
        Parameters:
        gravity - The gravity applied to the Entity
        drag - The drag applied to the Entity

      • toggleStopped

        public void toggleStopped()
        Toggles whether the Entity moves or not when updated. If the Entity is stopped, it will not move when updated.

      • handleSetLocation

        public void handleSetLocation(int x,
                              int y)
        Sets the location of the worldBounds to the specified x and y location.
        Specified by:
        handleSetLocation in interface BoundsListener
        Parameters:
        x - The new x location for the worldBounds
        y - The new y location for the worldBounds

      • handleTranslate

        public void handleTranslate(int dx,
                            int dy)
        Translates the worldBounds a distance specified by the change in x and y.
        Specified by:
        handleTranslate in interface BoundsListener
        Parameters:
        dx - The x distance to translate the worldBounds by
        dy - The y distance to translate the worldBounds by

      • getXSpeed

        public double getXSpeed()
        Get the current speed in the X direction
        Returns:
        speed in the X direction, as a double. Right is positive.

      • getYSpeed

        public double getYSpeed()
        Get the current speed in the Y direction
        Returns:
        speed in the Y direction, as a double. Down is positive.
